div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1777 Mesopotamia, 1925 Burial: c. 140 B.C. (M) Contents: 15+ AR Antiochus II: 2 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim) Seleucus II: 1 tetradr. (Apameia) Seleucus III: 2 tetradr. (Antiocheia) ANS 1944.100.75114 ANS 1944.100.75115 Antiochus III: 4 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim) Antiochus V: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Demetrius I: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Alexander I Bala: 3 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim 2, Antiocheia 1) Demetrius II, 1st reign: 1 tetradr. (An- tiocheia) Disposition: New York 5 Newell, ESM, index of hoards, s. v. Mesopotamia 1925. Record of varieties in ANS
